site.meta_description: Copenhagen Bistro is located in New York City’s East Village. The menu is built around seasonality and quality, whenever possible using locally grown, raised, caught, and crafted products, procured from people who do those things with care
site.meta_keywords: Copenhagen Bistro, New York, East Village, Food, Apples,
site.title: Copenhagen Bistro

description.text: Our greens are sourced from our very own rooftop garden.

<script src='https://cf.chownowcdn.com/latest/static/integrations/ordering-modal.min.js' data-chownow-company-id='2274'></script>

<style>
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Andada');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Oswald');

body.sticky-footer footer {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 100%;
}

header #header-alert-wrapper {
    z-index: 1200;
}
footer .btn {
    margin-top: 0px !important;
}
header #header-alert-wrapper #header-alert {
    background-image: url(http://getbento.imgix.net/accounts/53b64e9962d233f433338f4d046fd430/media/images/84214body_bg.jpg);
}


header #sticky-header #sticky-logo-wrapper img {
    height: 30px;
    margin-top: 15px;
    width: auto;
}

header #nav-wrapper nav .logo {
    display: none;
}

header #nav-wrapper nav ul.list-inline > li, header #sticky-header #sticky-nav-wrapper nav ul.list-inline > li, header #sticky-header #sticky-nav-wrapper nav a ul.list-inline > li {
    padding: 0px;
}

nav a, header #sticky-header #sticky-nav-wrapper nav, header #sticky-header #sticky-nav-wrapper nav a {
    padding: 4px 6px;
    border: 2px solid transparent;
}

nav a:hover, nav a:focus, nav a:active, .font-nav a:hover, .font-nav a:focus, .font-nav a:active, header #sticky-header #sticky-nav-wrapper nav a:hover, header #sticky-header #sticky-nav-wrapper nav a:active, header #sticky-header #sticky-nav-wrapper nav a:focus {
    border: 2px solid #282828;
    padding: 4px 6px;
}

h1 {
    font-size: 3.5rem;
}

h2 {
    font-size: 24px;
}

.btn, a.btn {
    letter-spacing: 0px;
}
/*
.btn:hover, .btn:focus, .btn:active, .btn.selected, .btn-font:hover, .btn-font:focus, .btn-font:active, .btn-font.selected, a.btn:hover, a.btn:focus, a.btn:active, a.btn.selected {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.21);
}

.menus-section .nav-pills li a:hover {
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.21);
}
*/
#news h2, .news-section .caption p, #press a, .news-section .caption p {
    text-align: center;
}

.press-section .caption h3, .press-section .caption p {
    text-align: center;
}

#press div.row {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

a.print-link {
    display: none;
}

header #mobile-header img {
    height: 30px;
    margin-top: 5px;
}

.select2-container--default .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__rendered {
    font-weight: 700 !important;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    color: #282828 !important;
}

.nav-pills.store-nav li a.active {
    background-color: #566268;
}

#footer a {
    text-decoration: none;
}

#footer h2 {
    margin-top: 12px;
}

button.btn.hidden-xs {
    margin-top: -15px;
}



@media (max-width: 767px) {
.private-events-section h2, #private-events .wysiwyg {
    text-align: center;
}
footer #main-footer-content .btn, footer #main-footer-content #signup-btn {
    display: none;
}

#footer-text > h2 > a{
display:none;
}

footer .btn {
    text-transform: uppercase;
    width: auto;
    text-align: center;
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
    white-space: normal;
    background: #282828;
    color: #ffffff;
    border-color: transparent;
    border-width: 0px;
}
footer #main-footer-content {
    height: auto;
    padding-top: 0px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
footer .btn:hover, footer .btn:focus {
    color: #ffffff;
    background: #242424;
}
}

</style>

all.name: The Lounge
all.description:
The Lounge is perfect for your next birthday dinner or corporate lunch. The room includes a private bar, and our bar staff can welcome your group for an interactive cocktail class. Projector available upon request.

12 Seated, 25 Standing

Inquiry Form

all.name: The Back Room
all.description:
The Back Room has capacity for up to 90 guests and is perfect for corporate functions, rehearsal dinners, weddings, and large parties. Projector and full A/V system are available upon request.

Inquiry Form

all.name: The Patio
all.description:
The Patio has capacity for up to 30 seated guests or 45 standing guests. The space is perfect for intimate private parties such as birthday celebrations, rehearsal dinners, cocktail hours and showers.

Weather Permitting

Inquiry Form

Click Here to Buy Tickets

Reservations not required, but recommended.

$1 Oysters

Join us for Copenhagen Bistro's 12th annual Mother's Day Brunch on Sunday, May 15th from 10:30am - 2:30pm. Show mom how much you care with a full buffet featuring our classic dishes and signature cocktails. 

Contact us to reserve your table.

all.name: BEEF SLIDERS
all.description:
Individual organic-beef sliders with lettuce and tomato.

12 per order.

required_fields.name: ADD-ONS
required_fields.help_text: Select up to two optional add-ons.

all.name: VEGETABLE SPRING ROLLS
all.description:
Assorted vegetables cooked and wrapped in crispy rice paper.

12 rolls per order.

all.name: TOMATO BRUSCHETTA
all.description:
Crispy french bread topped with tomatoes, goat cheese, and basil.

12 pieces per order.

all.name: FLATBREAD STATION
all.description:
An assortment of Margherita, pepperoni, and veggie flatbreads. 

Serves 30-40 people per order.

all.name: MEDITERRANEAN PLATTER
all.description:
Hummus, tabouli, assorted olives, and pita chips. 

Serves 30-40 people per platter.

all.name: CHARCUTERIE PLATTER
all.description:
Our charcuterie platter is a mix of ham, speck, salami, olives, cheese, and mustard.

Serves up to 12 people per platter.

all.name: LASAGNA
all.description:
Layers of pasta with ricotta, Italian cheeses and homemade red sauce. Vegetarian and Italian sausage options available.

24 slices per order.

required_fields.name: Lasagna Type
required_fields.help_text: Please select which type of lasagna you would like.

all.name: TACO BOX
all.description: Each taco box comes with 12 tacos with your choice of filling. Limes, radishes, green and red salsa included in all boxes.

all.name: KALE CAESAR SALAD
all.description:
Kale, black olives, fresh grated Parmesan, homemade croutons and house made Caesar dressing.

Small serves up to 20 people. 

Large serves 20-40 people.

all.name: FRUIT SKEWERS
all.description:
Skewers of strawberries, watermelon, pineapple, and other seasonal fruit.

12 skewers per order.

all.name: RASPBERRY CHEESECAKE BITES
all.description:
Mini cheesecakes topped with raspberries, raspberry sauce on the side.

12 pieces per order.

all.name: DOZEN COOKIES
all.description: Select 12 of our fresh-baked cookies. Gluten-free options available.
